summary: AN ORDINANCE defining the term "intimidate" as used in defining the crime of Pedestrian Interference, redefining the offense of Unlawful Purchase, Acquisition or Possession of Liquor, changing the classification of this offense from a violation to a crime, and amending Section 12A.12.015, Section 12A.24.100, and Section 12A.24.150 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
